Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.santorini.view.gui.controllers

Class GUISceneController<T extends GUIScene<?>,​S extends GUISceneControllerDelegate>

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.santorini.view.gui.controllers.GUISceneController<T,​S>
Type Parameters:
T - the type of the GUIScene
S - the type of the GUISceneControllerDelegate
All Implemented Interfaces:
GUISceneDelegate
Direct Known Subclasses:
HomeSceneController, LobbySceneController, SettingsSceneController, SetupSceneController
public abstract class GUISceneController<T extends GUIScene<?>,​S extends GUISceneControllerDelegate>
extends java.lang.Object
implements GUISceneDelegate
Brief the controller that handles the logic and the requests of a GUIScene. It is also bound to a GUISceneControllerDelegate to fulfill incoming requests.
See Also:
GUIScene, GUISceneControllerDelegate
